```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(reshape2)
library(stringr)
library(stringdist)
library(data.table)
```

Load data

```{r message = FALSE}
meta <- read_tsv("../data/yellow_fever_vac/metadata.txt") %>%
  filter(replica == "F1", time != -1) %>%
  select(-replica)

data <- meta %>%
  group_by(donor, time) %>%
  group_modify(~fread(paste0("../data/yellow_fever_vac/",
                                .x$file.name)))
```

Some processing

```{r}
data <- data %>%
  mutate(count = `Clone count`,
         cdr3nt = `N. Seq. CDR3`,
         cdr3aa = `AA. Seq. CDR3`,
         v = str_split_fixed(`All V hits`, fixed("*"), 2)[,1]) %>%
  filter(startsWith(`AA. Seq. CDR3`, "C"),
         endsWith(`AA. Seq. CDR3`, "F"),
         !grepl("[*_]", cdr3aa)) %>%
  group_by(donor, time, cdr3nt, cdr3aa, v) %>%
  summarise(count = sum(count)) %>% ungroup
```

Load annotations - A02LLW-specific clonotypes, mark them and clonotypes that differ by 1 mm
in CDR3 amino acid sequences in the dataset as specific

```{r}
annot <- read_tsv("../example/annotations.txt")

#Compute distances between strings:
get_distances <- function(aa.seq.1, aa.seq.2, threshold = 1,
                          method = "hamming", ...) {
  stringdistmatrix(unique(aa.seq.1), unique(aa.seq.2), 
                   method = method,
                   useNames = T, ...) %>%
    melt %>%
    filter(value <= threshold) %>%
    rename(aa.seq = Var1, aa.seq.db = Var2, dist = value) %>%
    mutate(aa.seq = as.character(aa.seq), aa.seq.db = as.character(aa.seq.db))
}

#An optimized routine that splits by length and processes in chunks(hamming only):
get_1mm_pairs <- function(aa.seq, aa.seq.db, chunks = 64) {
  d <- tibble(aa.seq = unique(aa.seq)) %>%
    mutate(len = nchar(aa.seq),
           chunk.id = rep(1:chunks, length.out = length(unique(aa.seq))))
  
  db <- tibble(aa.seq.db = unique(aa.seq.db)) %>%
    mutate(len.db = nchar(aa.seq.db)) 
  
  d %>%
    group_by(chunk.id, len) %>%
    group_modify(~ get_distances(.x$aa.seq, db %>% 
                                   filter(len.db == .y$len) %>%
                                   .$aa.seq.db)) %>%
    ungroup %>%
    select(-chunk.id, -len) 
}

annot <- get_1mm_pairs(data$cdr3aa, annot$cdr3aa) %>%
  rename(cdr3aa = aa.seq) %>%
  select(cdr3aa) %>%
  mutate(specificity = "A02LLW")

data <- data %>%
  mutate(specific = cdr3aa %in% annot$cdr3aa)
```

Merge datasets to check sharing between 'before' and 'after' time points

```{r}
data.1 <- data %>%
  mutate(tcrkey = paste(v, cdr3nt)) %>%
  select(-cdr3nt, -cdr3aa, -v)

data.m <- data.1 %>%
  group_by(donor, emerging, specific, time) %>%
  group_modify(~left_join(.x,
                          data.1 %>%
                            mutate(time.next = time) %>%
                            select(-time) %>%
                            filter(.y$time < time.next) %>%
                            mutate(found = T) %>%
                            select(tcrkey, time.next, found)))

data.m <- data.m %>%
  mutate(found = !is.na(found)) %>%
  mutate(quantile = case_when(
    count == 1 ~ "Singleton",
    count == 2 ~ "Doubleton",
    count == 3 ~ "Tripleton",
    T ~ "Large")) %>%
  mutate(quantile = factor(
    quantile,
    c("Singleton", 
      "Doubleton", 
      "Tripleton",
      "Large")))
```

Summarize data

```{r}
data.s <- data.m %>%
  group_by(time, time.next, donor, quantile, specific) %>%
  summarise(alpha = sum(found), beta = sum(!found)) %>%
  left_join(data.1 %>% 
              group_by(donor, time) %>%
              summarise(total.time = length(unique(tcrkey)))) %>%
  left_join(data.1 %>% 
              mutate(time.next = time) %>%
              select(-time) %>%
              group_by(donor, time.next) %>%
              summarise(total.time.next = length(unique(tcrkey)))) %>%
  ungroup

data.s <- data.s %>%
  group_by(time, donor, quantile, specific) %>%
  mutate(beta = sum(beta)) %>%
  filter(!is.na(time.next)) %>%
  ungroup
```
Build linear model

```{r}
data.s.1 <- data.s %>%
  mutate(logRecaptureProb = log10(alpha / (alpha + beta)),
         logSampleSizeRation = log10(total.time.next / total.time))

mdl <- lm(logRecaptureProb ~ quantile + logSampleSizeRation + specific, 
          data.s.1 %>% filter(time == 0, time.next == 15))
mdl
summary(mdl)
```

Plot figure

```{r}
p1 <- data.s.1 %>%
  mutate(specific = ifelse(specific, "A02LLW", "Other")) %>%
  mutate(time = paste("from", time) %>%
           factor(levels = c("from 0", "from 7", "from 15")),
         time.next = paste("to", time.next) %>%
           factor(levels = c("to 7", "to 15", "to 45"))) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = total.time.next / total.time, 
             y = alpha / (alpha + beta), 
             color = quantile,
             shape = specific,
             linetype = specific)) +
  geom_smooth(method = "lm", se = F) +
  geom_point() +
  scale_color_brewer("", palette = "Spectral") +
  scale_x_log10("Next time point to previous time point diversity ratio") +
  scale_y_log10("Re-capture probability") +
  scale_linetype_manual(values = c("solid", "dotted")) +
  scale_shape_manual(values = c(16, 1)) +
  facet_grid(time ~ time.next) +
  theme_classic() +
  theme(legend.position = "bottom")
p1

pdf("../figures/fig4a.pdf")
p1
dev.off()
```
